description: Ready in just 15 minutes, this warming and speedy chicken noodle soup lives up to its name. Think chicken mince, creamed and fresh corn and noodles.
name: Speedy Chicken Noodle Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
216g chicken instant noodles, broken in half

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over mediumhigh heat. Add mince and cook for 3 minutes, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, or until golden.

Add kernels, creamed corn, 5 cups water and flavour sachets from noodle packets, then bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally, to allow flavours to infuse.
Add noodles and simmer for 2 minutes or until noodles have softened. Stir in half of the chives, then serve topped with remaining chives.
